description: Chelsea: Robert Sanchez or Kepa Arrizabalaga? You decide
title: Chelsea: Robert Sanchez or Kepa Arrizabalaga? You decide
title_page: Chelsea: Robert Sanchez or Kepa Arrizabalaga? You decide - BBC Sport
maintext:
So, with Robert Sanchez now at Chelsea, who should Mauricio Pochettino pick in goal for the season opener against Liverpool?
Does the former Brighton man supplant Kepa Arrizabalaga, or are you backing the latter to hold off the competition?
